questions.question: The most common device used for measuring air speed is __________
The randomness of the molecules gives us ________ pressure
How does the pitot tube help in measuring the airspeed?
The instrument which combines both the static and total pressure is _______5
The dynamic pressure can be used in all flows from incompressible to hypersonic.
The dynamic pressure can be given by ____________

answers.a: difference of total and static pressure
answers.b: sum of total and static pressure
answers.c: product of total and static pressure
answers.d: double of total and static pressure

questions.question: The pressure difference (p0-p1) holds good only for incompressible flow.
When the local flow velocity is zero itself then _________.

answers.a: total pressure is not equal to static pressure
answers.b: total pressure is equal to static pressure

questions.question: An aircraft is flying at cruise level with a velocity of 110m/s at an altitude of 10 km and the dynamic pressure is 5.43kN/m2. Now assume the aircraft is flying is at sea level with a speed of 65m/s and the same dynamic pressure. In the above data, the velocity 65m/s refers to __________
Pitot tube with flat faces are more sensitive.
